import React, { useState } from "react"; function Contact() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: "", email: "", message: "", }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData((prevState) => ({ ...prevState, [name]: value, })); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Here you would typically send the form data to a server console.log("Form submitted:", formData); alert("Thank you for your message! I will get back to you soon."); setFormData({ name: "", email: "", message: "" }); }; return (

Contact Me

Professional Profiles

  • LinkedIn Profile
  • Download My Resume
); } export default Contact;
